item.title: About Me
item.description: 周彦峰 副教授 周彦峰，物理系副教授，2022年获福州大学“旗山学者”奖励支持计划（海外项目），主要从事拓扑材料中的量子输运方向的相关研究。 Our group have broad interests in condensed matter physics and quantum materials. Our research focuses primarily on topological insulators, topological superconductors, and quantum transport in mesoscopic systems. If you are interested, please send an email to find out more. Yanfeng Zhou Department of Physics Fuzhou University E-mail: yfzhou@fzu.edu.cn

item.title: Biosketch
item.description: Education and Employment Associate Professor, 2022 - Present Department of Physics Fuzhou University Postdoctoral Fellow, 08/2019 - 03/2022 The University of Texas at Dallas Advisor: Professor Fan Zhang Topics: Topological insulators PhD 2019, Condensed Matter Physics Peking University Advisor: Professor Qingfeng Sun Thesis: Controlling and braiding of Majorana states in two-dimensional topological superconductors MS 2015, Condensed Matter Physics Shenzhen University Advisor: Professors Yadong Wei and Yunjin Yu BS 2012, Physics

item.title: Publications
item.description: M. Fortin-Deschênes, R. Pu, Yan-Feng Zhou*, C. Ma, P. Cheung, K. Watanabe, T. Taniguchi, F. Zhang, X. Du, and F. Xia, Uncovering topological edge states in twisted bilayer graphene, Nano Lett. 22, 6186 (2022). Y.-F. Zhou, Switch and interference behaviors at domain walls of magnetic topological insulators, Materials Science & Engineering B 277, 115570 (2022). Y. Liu, R. Chen, Z. Zhang, M. Bockrath, C. N. Lau (OSU), Y.-F. Zhou, C.
